00021                                                 vector unsigned int b,
00022                                                 vector unsigned int c,

00034 inline static vector unsigned int vec_recursion(vector unsigned int a,
00035                                                 vector unsigned int b,
00036                                                 vector unsigned int c,
00037                                                 vector unsigned int d) {
00038 
00039     const vector unsigned int sl1 = ALTI_SL1;
00040     const vector unsigned int sr1 = ALTI_SR1;
00041 #ifdef ONLY64
00042     const vector unsigned int mask = ALTI_MSK64;
00043     const vector unsigned char perm_sl = ALTI_SL2_PERM64;
00044     const vector unsigned char perm_sr = ALTI_SR2_PERM64;
00045 #else
00046     const vector unsigned int mask = ALTI_MSK;
00047     const vector unsigned char perm_sl = ALTI_SL2_PERM;
00048     const vector unsigned char perm_sr = ALTI_SR2_PERM;
00049 #endif
00050     vector unsigned int v, w, x, y, z;
00051     x = vec_perm(a, (vector unsigned int)perm_sl, perm_sl);
00052     v = a;
00053     y = vec_sr(b, sr1);
00054     z = vec_perm(c, (vector unsigned int)perm_sr, perm_sr);
00055     w = vec_sl(d, sl1);
00056     z = vec_xor(z, w);
00057     y = vec_and(y, mask);
00058     v = vec_xor(v, x);
00059     z = vec_xor(z, y);
00060     z = vec_xor(z, v);
00061     return z;
00062 }

00068 inline static void gen_rand_all(void) {
00069     int i;
00070     vector unsigned int r, r1, r2;
00071 
00072     r1 = sfmt[N - 2].s;
00073     r2 = sfmt[N - 1].s;
00074     for (i = 0; i < N - POS1; i++) {
00075         r = vec_recursion(sfmt[i].s, sfmt[i + POS1].s, r1, r2);
00076         sfmt[i].s = r;
00077         r1 = r2;
00078         r2 = r;
00079     }
00080     for (; i < N; i++) {
00081         r = vec_recursion(sfmt[i].s, sfmt[i + POS1 - N].s, r1, r2);
00082         sfmt[i].s = r;
00083         r1 = r2;
00084         r2 = r;
00085     }
00086 }

00095 inline static void gen_rand_array(w128_t *array, int size) {
00096     int i, j;
00097     vector unsigned int r, r1, r2;
00098 
00099     r1 = sfmt[N - 2].s;
00100     r2 = sfmt[N - 1].s;
00101     for (i = 0; i < N - POS1; i++) {
00102         r = vec_recursion(sfmt[i].s, sfmt[i + POS1].s, r1, r2);
00103         array[i].s = r;
00104         r1 = r2;
00105         r2 = r;
00106     }
00107     for (; i < N; i++) {
00108         r = vec_recursion(sfmt[i].s, array[i + POS1 - N].s, r1, r2);
00109         array[i].s = r;
00110         r1 = r2;
00111         r2 = r;
00112     }
00113     /* main loop */
00114     for (; i < size - N; i++) {
00115         r = vec_recursion(array[i - N].s, array[i + POS1 - N].s, r1, r2);
00116         array[i].s = r;
00117         r1 = r2;
00118         r2 = r;
00119     }
00120     for (j = 0; j < 2 * N - size; j++) {
00121         sfmt[j].s = array[j + size - N].s;
00122     }
00123     for (; i < size; i++) {
00124         r = vec_recursion(array[i - N].s, array[i + POS1 - N].s, r1, r2);
00125         array[i].s = r;
00126         sfmt[j++].s = r;
00127         r1 = r2;
00128         r2 = r;
00129     }
00130 }

00146 inline static void swap(w128_t *array, int size) {
00147     int i;
00148     const vector unsigned char perm = ALTI_SWAP;
00149 
00150     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00151         array[i].s = vec_perm(array[i].s, (vector unsigned int)perm, perm);
00152     }
00153 }
